name: EXELIXIS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to access, coverage, and payment for cancer drugs.
Issues related to access, coverage, and payment for cancer drugs. Issues regarding the 340B program. CREATES Act of 2019 (S. 340/H.R. 965). Lower Health Care Costs Act (S. 1895).
